description: 4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets.  The 4.6x30mm round was developed by H&K to compete with FN Herstal's 5.7x28mm cartridge.  It has low recoil and excellent armor penetration.

4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated lead bullets.  The 4.6x30mm round was developed by H&K to compete with FN Herstal's 5.7x28mm cartridge.  It has low recoil, but no usual armor penetration due to using simple lead bullets rather than proper factory-made penetrator projectiles.

4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated lead bullets.  The 4.6x30mm round was developed by H&K to compete with FN Herstal's 5.7x28mm cartridge.  It has low recoil, but no usual armor penetration due to using simple lead bullets rather than proper factory-made penetrator projectiles.
